net.cnri.repository.internal

Class SimpleAuthenticatedCaller

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.cnri.repository.internal.SimpleAuthenticatedCaller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Caller

    public class SimpleAuthenticatedCaller
extends java.lang.Object
implements Caller
    A specification of a caller claiming no credentials (other than its own id) which is considered to be already authenticated.
    See Also:
    InternalRepository
